name: Shower Caddy 5 Pack,Adhesive Shower Organizer for Bathroom Storage&Home Decor&Kitchen,No Drilling,Large Capacity,Rustproof Stainless Steel Bathroom Organizer,Shower Shelves for Inside Shower-Larger
about_this_item: 5 Hanging Shower Organizer Set for Sufficient Bathroom Storage Space:The bathroom organizer comes with 5 pieces for different uses, including 2 shower caddies, 2 soap holders,1 toothbrush holder and 5 adhesives. Accommodate wash supplies or cooking seasonings easily with large capacities to make full use of space and facilitate your life; ideal for the dorm/bathroom/kitchen/toilet/tool room.

Durable Stainless Steel,Whole Hollow Design:Built with 100% premium SUS 304 stainless steel, each shower shelf is durable, rustproof, waterproof, and scratch-proof, thanks to its high-temperature baking paint process. Last for up to 8 years, even under humid conditions. A hollow design allows for good ventilation and drainage, easy to clean.This will be the most durable product you‚Äôve ever used.

40-Pound Bearing Weight,Reliable and Stable:The newest upgraded transparent traceless adhesives give ultra-strong reliability with up to 40 lbs of bearing weight, which is tested by professional institutions. Keep the tins and bottles in the bathroom shower caddy, and make them easy to fetch and use. Never worry about falling issues after proper installation.

Stronger Adhesive for Easy Installation,No Drilling:Installation only takes a few minutes, requiring no drilling holes or any tools and doing no damage to the wall. Clean the surface, stick the adhesives to the wall, and hang the shower shelves to use. Suitable for smooth surfaces like tiles/marble/glass/metal, but not for uneven surfaces like painted walls.

Efficient Storage Solution for Kitchen/Bathroom:Perfect for Bathroom Decor. It‚Äôs a perfect choice for keeping the bathroom or kitchen items well organized and within easy reach, which is widely applied in the kitchen or bathroom. These bathroom shelves feature rounded edges to ensure they won‚Äôt scratch your skin.

title: Actually works
content: I have tried a few different shower caddy brands and almost all do not stick well especially if the kids for get to take it out of the shelf to apply 2-1 pumps hair/conditioner bottles they will always crash but with these installation was easy & actually sticked 100% left it over night & another day before I started loading them up and they held firm!Not going to lie the only way these stay up is by taking whatever you have in there to apply to your hair/body if your looking for something that will stay even if you pump it on the shelf your best bet is a corner spring loaded caddy or 1 that hangs over your shower door or fixture but that could lead to a pipe breaking :/
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 21, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Really good shower caddy set, holds all my bottles and has room for more! Have had it over a month now and havent had any issues. Pretty easy to put up too, although make sure the sticky tape is facing the right side up when you stick it to the wall for when you hook in the caddy.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2024
